resources.string: Welcome to the mind reading app! Grab your popcorn, get cozy and be ready to get your minds boggled!

"

Wait! Before running the game, I want you to follow the given steps:

1. Select a number between 1 & 50.

2. Add all the digits and subtract from the selected number.

e.g.-

a)47(selected number)

b)4+7(addition of the digits)=11

c)47-11(Subtraction from selected number).


"
Before we continue any further, please enter the following details.
Check which of the following symbols matches your answer and remember it...
Once you have seen the symbol, click ready and be ready to see the magic!
Successfully read your mind! This was your symbol, wasnt it?
Awesome! Thanks for using my app! Hope you enjoyed using it. Since its managed by me alone, it could take some time before new features come by.
Have anything to say? Feel free to contact me anytime! (Except the time when I am hanging out with my gf or when I am trying to hack into Area 51 servers! :P) Just kidding.
Oh man! I totally forgot to introduce myself! BTW, I am Dash, Nitish Dash. Drop me a mail at nitishdash95@gmail.com. â˜º
Awesome app idea by - Anirban Paul
